entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Estevan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Estevan Airport 10:00 AM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.5°C
Pressure: 103.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -15.0°C
Wind: E 21 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Local blowing snow early in the afternoon. Blowing snow late in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
